snippet: Officials said consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.
abstract: Obama administration begins notifying consumers they should return to federal health insurance marketplace to renew coverage for 2015; say consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.
lead_paragraph: Officials said consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.

headline.main: U.S. Says Consumers Must Renew Health Insurance Policies
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Consumers Must Renew Policies

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
